Is anyone else able to get this to work with RCS? Whenever i toggle it on it just looks like RCS is disabled?

Many Thanks.

Unlike KSP1, the new precision controls lock you to an absurdly small control input.   As in, full control surfaces barely visibly deflect.  The RCS is probably firing, but it's a miniscule amount.  I dislike the change a lot, personally.
